questions.question: What is the dominant color of the visible fabric?
What textile certification label is present?
What brand is indicated on the care label?
What material composition percentage is specified for cotton?
What is the primary fiber content of the fabric?
Does the label display any washing instructions?
What is the overall shape of the visible item?
What type of label is depicted in the image?
Is there evidence of any visible seams or hems?
What is the texture of the fabric based on visual appearance?
What is the apparent finish of the fabric (e.g., matte, glossy)?
Is the fabric visibly patterned or printed?
Based on image, does the fabric appear woven or knitted?
What is the general state of the fabric (e.g., wrinkled, creased)?
What is the apparent weight or thickness of the fabric?
